attributes.action: Relax the excessive restrictions to allow Welsh motorsport to take place.
attributes.additional_details: Make an assessment of each event based on the risk assessment and other documentation provided and act accordingly.
attributes.background:
Relax the excessive restrictions to allow motor sport to take place in line with those within the uk. 

The current restrictions mean it is impossible for organisers to plan ahead events - meaning many more events, businesses and jobs could be lost permanently.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://petitions.senedd.wales/
